entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0108.10095] The concept us-gaap:FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetTransfersOutOfLevel3 with a period duration starting on 2023-03-31 and ending on 2023-06-30 or 91 days with a reported value of 401,000,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2022-12-31 and ends on 2023-06-30 with a value of 219,000,000. The value 401,000,000 for the period of 91 days should be less or the same as the value 219,000,000 with a duration of 181 days assuming that the concept us-gaap:FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetTransfersOutOfLevel3 cannot have a negative value. If the difference between the two numbers is insignificant, check that the decimals of the two values are appropriate. The decimal value of 401,000,000 is -6, and the decimals of 219,000,000 is -6. The properties of this us-gaap:FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetTransfersOutOfLevel3 fact are: Period :2023-04-01 to 2023-06-30 Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:10095 Rule version: 26.0.9 - fmcc-20240630.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Transfers out of Level 3
